summary: Implements the Flask-based web server for the mscolab module, exposing HTTP endpoints and SocketIO events to manage user accounts, authentication, email confirmation, password resets, operation creation and editing, permission handling, messaging, and file uploads for collaborative flight planning.
business_intent: Provide a collaborative platform where pilots and flight planners can create, share, and edit flight operation data in real time, while managing user registrations, access rights, and communications securely.
